query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: European Modelling Forum
result.description: This task will focus on engaging a variety of stakeholders, disseminating the results to a broad audience, and feeding the findings into EU discussions, especially related to the SET-Plan. Various interest groups (as outlined in Section 1.3.5) will be addressed and involved through a multidisciplinary stakeholder dialogue building on online exchanges as well as expert workshops. These will serve to get additional input for the pathway and case study assessments performed in WPs 1-6, to cross-check assumptions, to peer-review, discuss and communicate the results and to engage decision makers. A plan to organise internal and external communication will be developed. It will define the roles of stakeholders and the appropriate modes of communication along the project process.

result.title: CONSENS communication strategy and communication tools
result.description: The communication strategic plan for the project will contain a description of planned activities set up using the 6W approach. A graphical branding will be defined for the project and applied to project templates and marketing materials. An initial set of communication materials (flyers, posters, banner, and kakemono) will be produced.

result.title: Progress on exploitation and dissemination, First Period
result.description: This report will describe all communication and networking activities undergone during preceding period. The report will cover the standard communications activities, the scientific publications and dissemination and exploitation opportunities, the activities of the CAB and the networking with other relevant initiatives. It will include an estimate of achieved impact and correction to the communication plan will be proposed for implementation for the next period. It will be prepared by inno, while INVITE will contribute with the public summary of exploitation activities.

result.description: Together with the users (BTS, P&G, INV, BASF, COAT) and the sensor providers (TNO, KROH, BAM) the procedure for specifying sensor requirements will be presented. The procedure will be applicable to both sensor development within the project and beyond.
